LanguageData.RecentIncidentChitchat.label: recent incident chitchat
LanguageData.RecentIncidentChitchat.logRulesInitiator: r_logentry->[INITIATOR_nameDef] and [RECIPIENT_nameDef] [talkedabout] the [incident_type], [incident], that occurred [period] ago.
r_logentry->[INITIATOR_nameDef] [talkedabout] the [incident_type], [incident], that occurred [period] ago with [RECIPIENT_nameDef].
r_logentry->[INITIATOR_nameDef] [commentedabout] the [incident_type], [incident], that occurred [period] ago to [RECIPIENT_nameDef].
r_logentry->[INITIATOR_nameDef] [asked] [RECIPIENT_nameDef] about the [incident_type], [incident], that occurred [period] ago.
r_logentry->[INITIATOR_nameDef] [informed] [RECIPIENT_nameDef] about the [incident_type], [incident], that occurred [period] ago.
